name: It's Mr. Pants
description: It's Mr. Pants is a puzzle video game developed by Rare. It was published by THQ for the Game Boy Advance (GBA) handheld game console in North America and Europe in 2005. The game was published internationally on mobile phones by In-Fusio in both 2005 and 2006. The game stars Mr. Pants, a crudely drawn mascot formerly featured on Rare's website.
